author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/), D8H
description:
Users can click on the checkbox to add and remove the checkmark. 

How to use:
- Add this extension to a shape painter object
- Use condition "Is checked" to find out the state of the checkbox

Tips:
- Checkbox state can also be changed by an action.
- Checkbox can be disabled so that users cannot interact with it 
- To remove halo, Set "halo hover" and "halo pressed" opacity to 0
name: Checkbox
shortDescription: Checkbox that can be toggled by a left-click or touch.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Checkbox that can be toggled by a left-click or touch.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Checkbox

events.comment: Make sure object doesn't get re-drawn every frame
Start halo at same size as thumb
Grow halo even more when pressed
Detect press ending
Detect hover and  touch/click
Detect mouse clicks near checkbox
Reset hover detection
Grow halo when hovered
Shrink halo to zero when not hovered
Redraw checkbox only when halo is not at final size
Fix inputs that create malformed checkboxes
Set halo radius, if not specified
Check if halo is bigger than checkbox
Prepare halo
Draw halo (it will grow or shrink as needed)
Use a more opaque halo while being dragged (it will grow or shrink as needed)
Change shape painter based on properties
Prepare color of checkmark
Draw left-side of checkmark
Draw right-side of checkmark

eventsFunctions.description: Check (or uncheck) the checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetChecked

eventsFunctions.description: Enable or disable interactions with the checkbox. Users cannot interact while it is disabled.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnabled

events.comment: Stop dragging (so the checkbox won't be dragging when it gets enabled)
Reset halo size (so halo won't appear when checkbox gets enabled)

eventsFunctions.description: If checked, change to unchecked.  If unchecked, change to checked.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleChecked

eventsFunctions.description: Change the primary color of checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPrimaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Change the secondary color of checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetSecondaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Change the halo opacity when pressed.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloOpacityPressed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo opacity of _PARAM0_ when pressed: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the halo opacity when hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloOpacityHover
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo opacity of _PARAM0_ when hovered: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the halo radius when pressed.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloRadiusPressed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo radius of _PARAM0_ when pressed: _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Change the halo radius when hovered. This size is also used to detect interaction with the checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloRadiusHover
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo radius of _PARAM0_ when hovered: _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Change the border thickness of checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBorderThickness
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the border thickness of _PARAM0_: _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Change the side length of checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetSideLength
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the side length of _PARAM0_: _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Change the line width of checkmark.
eventsFunctions.name: SetLineWidth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the line width of _PARAM0_: _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox is checked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsChecked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox interations are enabled.
eventsFunctions.name: IsEnabled

eventsFunctions.description: Return the color used to draw the outline of the checkbox (when unchecked) and the fill color (when checked).
eventsFunctions.name: PrimaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Return the color used to fill the checkbox (when unchecked) and to draw the checkmark (when checked).
eventsFunctions.name: SecondaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Return the radius of the halo while the checkbox is touched or clicked.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Halo radius while touched or clicked
eventsFunctions.name: HaloRadiusPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Return the opacity of the halo while the checkbox is touched or clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: HaloOpacityPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Return the radius of the halo when the mouse is hovering near the checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: HaloRadiusHover

eventsFunctions.description: Return the opacity of the halo when the mouse is hovering near the checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: HaloOpacityHover

eventsFunctions.description: Return the line width of checkmark (pixels).
eventsFunctions.name: LineWidth

eventsFunctions.description: Return the side length of checkbox (pixels).
eventsFunctions.name: SideLength

eventsFunctions.description: Return the border thickness of checkbox (pixels).
eventsFunctions.name: BorderThickness

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox is being pressed by mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsBeingPressed
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ is being pressed by mouse or touch

eventsFunctions.description: Update the hitbox.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateHitbox

events.comment: Include border in the collision mask

propertyDescriptors.label: Halo size (hover). If blank, this is set to "SideLength".
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloRadiusHover

propertyDescriptors.label: State of the checkbox has changed. (Used in "ToggleChecked" function)
propertyDescriptors.name: ToggleChanged

propertyDescriptors.label: Primary color of checkbox. (Example: 24;119;211) Fill color when box is checked.
propertyDescriptors.name: PrimaryColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Secondary color of checkbox. (Example: 255;255;255) Color of checkmark when box is checked.
propertyDescriptors.name: SecondaryColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Line width of checkmark (px) (Min: 1, Max: 1/4 * SideLength)
propertyDescriptors.name: LineWidth

propertyDescriptors.label: Border thickness (px) This border is only visible when the checkbox is unchecked.
propertyDescriptors.name: BorderThickness

propertyDescriptors.label: Halo size (pressed). If blank, this is set to "HaloRadiusHover * 1.1"
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloRadiusPressed
